title: account hacked question
body: my main account "jamril ezhno" got hacked. when i try to log in it says that it's swtiching regions. i attempted to change the password 3 times and it will still say i have the wrong password on the website and that it's attempting to switch regions in the client. i've sent a support ticket and gotten an email saying this may take some time to process. I was wondering how long this might take and also if there's any ways i can speed the process of getting my account back? is there more steps that i could take?

replies.body: i just wish i knew if it'd be like 2 days or 2 weeks or 2 months. kind of annoying playing on lv 5 account lol

I can't provide you an ETA on when you'll see a reply, since that changes all the time, depending on how many support tickets were submitted recently. Other than ensuring you've provided the most accurate answers to our recovery specialist, there's nothing else you can do to speed up the process.
